Name: Great Chase
Instructions: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir. (Rather than measuring what is around a barspoon of lemon juice, you may prefer to gently squeeze the lemon wedge garnish prior dropping into the drink.
Review: A lightly elderflower, relatively dry and refreshing spritz-style drink.
History: First promoted by the Chase Distillery late in 2015, the original specification called for Chase Vodka and Chase Elderflower, hence the name.
Nutrition: One serving of Great Chase contains 137 calories
